name: kwaitube-clone
description: Kwai clone with YouTube Shorts integration

scripts.build: mkdir -p www/services www/components && cp index.html index.tsx App.tsx types.ts constants.tsx www/ && cp services/*.ts www/services/ && cp components/*.tsx www/components/ && echo 'Build concluído com sucesso!'
scripts.postinstall: npx cap add android || echo 'Pasta Android já existe'
